title: Admitted Student Events  |  Admitted Students  |  Admission & Aid  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Admission & Aid Types of Admission Visit DePaul Tuition Room & Board Scholarships Financial Aid Veteran Student Test Credit & Placement Check Your Application Status Admitted Students Deadlines Immunization Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Admitted Students>Admitted Student Events Admitted Student Events ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Let’s connect. The best way to get an in-depth look at what life is like at DePaul without being on campus is to attend an online admitted student session, talk to a counselor, and hear what current students are saying onDeBlogs. We hope to have you on campus in the near future! Admitted Freshman Preview Days Get the full Blue Demon Experience at an Admitted Freshman Preview Day! At an Admitted Freshman Preview Day, you will get an in-depth look at your academic college by meeting current faculty, participating in a sample class, hearing from our Career Center and meeting other newly admitted students. Space is limited for this in-person event! Register for an Admitted Freshman Preview Day Admitted Student Information Sessions Admitted Information Sessions include information about academics, student life, student outcomes following graduation and the next steps to enrollment. Sessions for incoming freshmen will be available in early 2023. Admitted StudentTransfer Student Appointments with an Admission Counselor Meet one-on-one with your admission counselor via Zoom! Incoming FreshmanTransfer and Adult Undergraduate Meet with a Financial Aid Counselor Ourfinancial aidteam is here to help you and your family understand how to finance your DePaul degree! Reach out by emailingOFA_NewStudent@depaul.eduor calling312-362-8610to get connected.
